description: This file is an ESLint configuration script written in JavaScript, setting up linting rules and configurations for a project that uses Svelte, TypeScript, and other JavaScript tools.

methods.name: ts.config
methods.description: Configures ESLint with TypeScript and other plugin settings, combining multiple configs and custom options.

methods.name: includeIgnoreFile
methods.description: Includes ignore patterns from a specified ignore file into the ESLint configuration.
